segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and I can’t believe how calm the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her turn, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so chaotic, but also kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don’t fall before the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels like a snapshot of real life.
segments.speaker: PAR
